entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:22 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
